title: Programmed To Love You
alternative_title: 设定要求我爱你 ; Shè dìng yāoqiú wǒ ài nǐ
status: 设定要求我爱你 ; Shè dìng yāoqiú wǒ ài nǐ
description:
Description :
        The torment you inflict upon me— I'll endure it willingly.
Is my burning desire to grow closer to Master every day simply just a pre-programmed setting?! Was I intentionally created with a face resembling someone Master once loved? Is this all a conspiracy, or just a ticking time-bomb? But! Wu Qing doesn't understand such complicated things! I just want to make Master happy! Even in a plague-ridden, post-apocalyptic world, I just want to get closer to Master!
A Clueless, Loyal Android x A Sickly, Cold-Hearted Researcher

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: I Am Willing To Be Treated Like This By The Mistress
Vol.1 Chapter 1: If You Like Kneeling That Much, Kneel Until Your Knees Disintegrate
